厙字的基本解释

厙
shè
见“厍”。

厙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shè］
［《廣韻》始夜切，去禡，書。］
“厍1”的繁体字。
(1)方言。村庄。多用于地名。
(2)姓。汉有厍钧。见《後汉书·窦融传》。

厙字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【厂字部】　厙； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页161第25
【唐韻】始夜切【集韻】【韻會】式夜切，?音舍。【廣韻】姓也。出《姓苑》。今台括有之。【韻會】後漢竇融傳，金城太守厙鈞。今羌中有姓厙，音舍。云：承鈞後。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shè]
["Guangyun" began to cut at night, go to the 禡, book. ]
"厍1" in traditional characters.
(1) Dialects. village. Mostly used for place names.
(2) Last name. Han has She Jun. See "Book of the Later Han·Biography of Dou Rong".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Factory Word Department] 　厍; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 161-25
[Tang Yun] The beginning of the night cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] The style of night cut,? Yinshe. [Guang Yun] The last name is also. Out of "Surname Garden". It is included in today's station. [Rhyme Club] Later Han Dou Rong Biography, Jincheng Prefect She Jun. In today's Qiang, there is the surname She, Yinshe. Yun: After Cheng Jun.
